channel.title: Hugo on Retold
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Retold

item.title: Automate Your Hugo Website Deployment to GitHub Page
item.description: Setting up a blog under your own control might sound tricky, unless you know the secret … Mine is Hugo + GitHub Pages. There are lots of helpful articles avialbe online, a proof that many people have tried it out. Below is a summary of my approach: Set up a repository for the source content. Set up another repository for the GitHub page, which will host your generated website.
